assert(x + y == n); // Line A
assert(n - z == x && y == n); // Line B
assert(y + z == n); // Line C  
assert(x + y  >= n || (y > 0 ? x <=n :x==z));  	//Line D

assert(n == x + y); // Line A
assert(x + z == n && y != 0); // Line B
assert(y + z == n && x != 0 ); // Line C
assert(z - y >= 1 || (x > 1)); //Line D

assert(x + y == n); // Line A
assert(z + x == n); // Line B
assert(y + z == 0 || y - z > 0 && (y-1) %2!=z%2 );// Line C
assert(n-y==x);//Line D

assert(n == x + y); // Line A
assert(y == z + x && n == y); // Line B
assert(z - 1 + y >= n || (z==0 && !y)); // Line C  
assert(x+y+z-1 <=n || (!x&&y));    ;// line D
